attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognise that Sharia Law is incompatible with Secular Democracy and Ban all implementations, accommodations and services that allow Sharia to be implemented 'by stealth' into the UK.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban Sharia Law."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
